Classes in netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic used by netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic

          This component outputs text from a DataFieldConnector
AttributeText.XEOHTMLRenderer
           
Form
          A form with dependences control.
GridColumnRenderer
          This interface is used to add a custim renderer to a column When a GridPanel is rendering a column, e invokes the method render(...,...,...) and receive the text ou html regenerated and put in the GridColumn Exempla of usage: Bean Code: public GridColumnRenderer getMyRenderer() { return new GridColumnRenderer() { public String render( GridPanel grid, DataRecordConnector record, DataFieldConnector field ) { String oValue = field.getValue(); return "" + oValue + ""; } } }

Classes in netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic used by netgest.bo.xwc.xeo.components
Attribute
          This components renders a label and the input component for a DataFieldConnector The inputType is automatic calculated based on the renderType returned from the DataFieldConnector but can be overwrited for any valid AttributeBase input field Example:
AttributeBase
          This component is not usable in the viewers, is the base of all attribute Type Components
AttributeLabel
          This component renders a label for a input component
ColumnAttribute
          This component represents a Column in a Grid panel It must reside inside of a Columns element in the viewer
ErrorMessages
          This component render's alert boxes and messages in client brwoser, and controls the save state of of viewer.~ He also invokes some special bean properties to handle the alert box, data was not saved!
